QuestData.Title: Zanzil's Secret
QuestData.Description: Years ago, the Gurubashi exiled one of their own from Zul'Gurub: a troll by the name of Zanzil. The reasons why aren't all that clear, but I'd guess it had something to do with his tendency to administer powerful, behavior-altering drugs to anyone he saw. Anyhow, the Gurubashi priests and their blood god have been slain, but Zanzil the Outcast remains...$b$b...as do his powerful, behavior-altering drugs.$b$bI need his mixture for my next test. Check the zombies to the north.
QuestData.CompletionText: Excellent... you're not a zombie yet. That's good.$b$bOh, umm... nothing. It's just that... that was a potential risk. Did I forget to warn you?
QuestData.RewardText: <Dask carefully analyzes the strange compound.>$b$bThis mixture is... PERFECT! Let's see what it does to your potentially-titan artifact here!
